tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_impact_analysis (
  policy_id INT,
  demographic_group VARCHAR(255),
  impact_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(20),
    income DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_changes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    description VARCHAR(255),
    enacted_date DATE,
    impact_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_impact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_id INT,
    demographic_id INT,
    effect VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE impact_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    demographic_id INT,
    impact_score INT,
    impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyImpact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    group_id INT,
    impact_value FLOAT,
    impact_date DATE
);
